Name: VinylRecordsManager

CreationRequirements.InitialRequirement: help me to manage my vinyl recors collection
CreationRequirements.ReviewedRequirement: Design a software module to help users manage their vinyl record collections. The module should allow users to catalog their records, track their listening habits, and discover new music based on their collection. Users should be able to add, update, delete, and search records in their collection. The module should also provide insights into their collection, such as most listened-to records, genres, and artists. Additionally, the module should offer recommendations for new records based on the user's existing collection.
FunctionalDetails: Catalog vinyl records with detailed information
Provide insights and statistics about the collection
Offer recommendations for new records based on the collection
UserInteraction: Add a new vinyl record to the collection
Update or delete an existing record
Search for records by various criteria (artist, genre, title, etc.)
View statistics and insights about the collection

MinimumFeatures.Description: Simple statistics (e.g., count of records by genre)

BarRaiserFeatures.Description: Integration with music databases for automatic record information retrieval
Social features (e.g., sharing collection with friends)
Advanced recommendation system with machine learning
Mobile app integration for barcode scanning

Description: Vinyl record collection manager with CRUD operations, listening session tracking, statistics, and genre-based recommendations
